about_the_game:
Isle of the Eagle is an open world Eagle flight simulation game that takes place in Alaska! In this game, you will: 

-Explore 3 Islands!

-Complete mini quests! 

-Fly high over the islands or dive into the water to catch fish! 

-Discover Treasure to unlock special abilities!

-Earn hunting medals for catching and eating crabs, snow hares, and fish! 

-Encounter Alaskan wildlife (Grizzly Bears, Humpback whale, Polar Bears, and more!) 

*Be amazed at the beautiful graphics and Alaskan scenery!
detailed_description:
Isle of the Eagle is an open world Eagle flight simulation game that takes place in Alaska! In this game, you will: 

-Explore 3 Islands!

-Complete mini quests! 

-Fly high over the islands or dive into the water to catch fish! 

-Discover Treasure to unlock special abilities!

-Earn hunting medals for catching and eating crabs, snow hares, and fish! 

-Encounter Alaskan wildlife (Grizzly Bears, Humpback whale, Polar Bears, and more!) 

*Be amazed at the beautiful graphics and Alaskan scenery!
legal_notice:
Legal Disclaimer:

This game features flying and dynamic lighting effects, including changing colors. Players sensitive to motion or light effects are encouraged to play with care.
name: Isle of the Eagle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260x or equivalent (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio (commonly found on most PCs) or DirectX compatible soundcard with latest drivers
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better (Quad core processors are ideal for most Unity games)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster X or ASUS Xonar SE
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: A beautiful open world/exploration eagle simulator game that takes place in Alaska! Fly from island to island with incredibly fun and realistic flying controls! Complete mini quests! Unlock special abilities! Discover Treasure! Controllers supported: PS5, Xbox, or PC Keyboard.
